item.title: Whisp - personal
item.description: Whisp is an android app written in Kotlin that simulates phone call between user and lost loved one to help with grieving process. It is inspired by Japan’s Phone of the Wind. The feeling of communication with a lost loved one can be a very beneficial and positive way of coping with loss. With deaths on the rise this year, I wanted to bring the magic and beauty of the Phone of the Wind to smartphones for greater accessibility.
